title: 8-plex for sale
text: Reinvesting owner offers 8-plex for sale at reasonable price. All it needs is your down payment

title: House For Sale - 3Br/2Ba
text: Divorce leads to sale of this 3/2 house in an area full of owner occupied homes. On the market for 5 months.

title: House For Sale - 3Br/2Ba
text: Good investment potential for patient buyers. Positive cashflow even though rents are weak.

title: 4-Plex for sale
text: Forced sale. Out-of-state, financially distressed owner years behind on taxes.

title: 8-Plex for sale
text: Professional person needs cash to save partnership. 8-plex on sale to raise capital.

title: Automated Business for sale
text: Successful 4 bay coin operated auto wash near busy intersection.

title: 20 Acres for Sale
text: 20 acres of vacant land, currently zoned residential. Possibility of good appreciation if rezoned commercial.

title: 8-Plex for Sale
text: Retiring investor/owner offers her 8-Plex at current appraisal value. Professional lawn service and management. Full Records

title: Tenant Damages Your Property
text: Tenant refuses to pay rent after losing job. When you get him evicted you discover significant damanges to your property. If you own any rental property, you must pay for damages.

title: Limited Partner Wanted
text: Non-franchise sandwich shop doubling the number of locations. Owner needs additional equity capital to get operating loan.

title: 4-plex for Sale
text: 'Project' 4-plex for sale is rehabilitating neighborhood. Owner being forced out by income tax liens.

title: 4-plex for Sale
text: Older 4-Plex next to new highway for sale. Priced for quick sale.

title: Pizza Franchise for Sale
text: Healthy pizza franchise. Next to college. High traffic

title: Limited Partner Wanted
text: Auto Dealer wants to expand into leasing 2 and 3 year old cars. Needs capital from an interested partner.

title: Duplex For Sale
text: Duplex owner must sell to pay hospital bills. Two tenants in place. Good investment opportunity.

title: Bed & Breakfast
text: Owner retiring, wants out NOW. Great clientele in resort community. 5Br/3Ba

title: House For Sale - 3Br/2Ba
text: 3/2 house on golf course. Good rentals and nice financing
